articles.title: Keke Palmer reportedly filmed over a dozen takes to nail her Nope opening monologue - The A.V. Club

articles.content: To nail her introductory monologue as Nopes high-energy horse trainer Emerald Haywood, Keke Palmer reportedly racked up dozens of wildly different takes, according to director Jordan Peele. The actor… [+1711 chars]
